sentences.sentence: You only knew the town was there, because you knew there could have been no such blotch upon the view without a town.
sentences.translation: 你只知道城镇就在那儿，因为你知道，如果城镇不存在，风景上就不会有这样的污点。

sentences.sentence: The sooty blotch will wipe off of the fruit and fly speck will not.
sentences.translation: 煤烟斑将其擦去，而蝇斑则不会。

sentences.sentence: This blotch may become faint in larger species.
sentences.translation: 此斑可能变得更大的物种微弱。
